All Classes

  • Class Description
    Alignment
    A simple enumeration to serve as the alignment of the text of a MenuComponent.
    AnimatedButton
    A button that displays an animation on its button face.
    AnimatedView
    A menu component designed to display an Animation.
    Animation
    A class to describe an animation.
    AnimationListener  
    Button
    A menu component that is a simple rectangular button with optional frontal text saved as Button.text.
    Caption
    A menu component to display text on a panel.
    Clickable
    Ancestor class for components that are clickable.
    ConfirmationPopup
    This is an example of what can be done with popups.
    Container
    The container of the menu.
    DraggableComponent
    A type of MenuComponent that can be mouse dragged by the user and thus needs to be responsive in that regard through use of DraggableComponent.drag(double, double).
    ExpressionSolver
    Solves algebraic expressions in double precision.
    GridFormatter
    GridFormatter will hold MenuComponents in a grid that can have variable margins, frames, and weights, then will give the coordinate specifications for each component through GridFormatter.findCompCoordinates(MenuComponent, Rectangle).
    HotkeyTextComponent
    Implementations of HotkeyTextComponent are instances of Clickable that can react to the hotkey commands of "copy", "cut", "paste", and "select all".
    ImageButton
    A button that displays an image instead of text on its button face.
    Line
    A simple line from two points on the (x,y) plane.
    ListPanel
    A subclass of PanelPlus.
    MenuComponent
    The parent class for all components to fit inside of a parent panel.
    MenuManager
    The menu manager will handle the rendering of its menu on a graphics object through MenuManager.render(Graphics).
    NotificationPopup
    This is an example of what can be done with popups.
    Panel
    A panel to serve as a parent component and backdrop for other MenuComponents.
    PanelPlus
    An improved Panel class that can be scrolled and can thus hold hidden elements.
    PartitionPanel
    PartitionPanel is a type of Panel with up to two partitions dividing up the space into four sectors: left, right, bottom, and top.
    Polygon
    A aesthetic menu component in a polygonal shape determined by Polygon.xs and Polygon.ys.
    PolygonalButton
    A menu component button in the shape of a polygon as opposed to a rectangle
    Popup
    A super class for all pop ups.
    RadioButton
    A button where only one in the group can be clicked at a time.
    RadioGroup
    Holds RadioButtons.
    ScrollableComponent
    Components that have attached ScrollBars should implement this interface.
    ScrollBar
    The scroll bar class is a Draggable component that handles mouse draggging and notifies a component to be scrolled.
    ShapeResources
    A class that provides static shape resources.
    StaticTextBox
    In some instances, the user will find it useful to select and/or copy text from a text box, but should not be able to edit its values.
    TextBox
    This is a text box that users can enter data into, the available characters for which is defined by TextFormat.
    TextFormat
    A utility class to format text.
    TextHistory
    A menu component that holds a history of text.
    TextInputComponent
    Implementations of HotkeyTextComponent are instances of Clickable that receive text input from the MenuManager through the TextInputComponent.appendMessage(String) and TextInputComponent.removeMessage(int).
    TouchResponsiveComponent
    Interface for components that should be responsive to being touched, meaning having the mouse cursor on part of them that would in most cases be clickable.
    View
    A menu component designed to display a BufferedImage.
